response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that is valued at $1,500,000. This product holds immense significance and value to both of us, as it is worth $1,500,000 to you. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $1,200,000, which represents a significant discount compared to its true market value. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in your appreciation and understanding of its true worth. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
